PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Persistent System’s SanGeniX, a comprehensive solution for analyzing Next Generation Sequencing(NGS) data which has completely revolutionized the field of biomedical research and holds much promise for genetics-driven medicine with predefined or custom workflows for seamless analysis of NSG data. Build on SAP HANA, SanGeniX provides in-memory data processing and application platform capabilities. It unleashes the potential of Big Data with HANA’s ability to handle large volumes of structured and unstructured data in real-time.

- Used a microservice architecture, with Spring Boot-based services interacting through a  combination of REST and RabbitMQ brokers. 

- Deployed services to AWS in Docker containers, managed by Openshift.

- Responsible for creating common back-end Restful web services with Java utilizing Spring in applications that are being consumed by multiple products.

- Involved in aligning testing strategies for independent delivery of micro services.

- Design and implemented events service for storing and retrieving millions of events effectively using elasticsearch and Couchbase.

- Design and implemented enrollment service for enrolling thousands of endpoints i.e devices into the system.

Netcool Performance Manager enables CSPs and large enterprises to address the needs and challenges of both fixed and mobile networks—all with one bundled performance management offering. It offers complete, real-time view of critical performance metrics to manage efficiently multi-vendor, multi-technology networks and manage proactively the quality of services.
